title.rendered: Avast Premium Security 10 Devices, 1 Year, Global

content.rendered:
• Intelligent Antivirus: Detect and block viruses, malware, spyware, ransomware and phishing. We use smart analytics to stop threats before they affect you.
  • Webcam Shield: Stop webcam spying for good. Now apps have to ask you for permission to use your webcam, so you always know who’s watching.
  • Ransomware Shield: Block ransomware and other untrusted apps from changing, deleting, or encrypting your personal photos and files.
  • Wi-Fi Inspector: Automatically detect weaknesses in your home Wi-Fi and strangers piggybacking on your network.
